answers.answer: Diabetes is linked to Hep C....and diabetes can cause high blood pressure.But high blood pressure can also happen if you have a family history of it...or from kidney damage and many other reasons.

Certainly doesn't mean Hep C is back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!One blood pressure reading doesn't mean much -you could have been over exerted or nervous.Get it checked again-if consinstently raised can be easily treated.

question: Iv'e been free of Hep C for a couple of years and now i'm shocked to find my blood presure read 190/145. I just had a notion now, mabee the Hep C is back. Q...Is high blood presure linked to Hep C ?
title: link to HBP
